 Windlord::
 
"I've heard that this is past earth" said Windlord "I never saw a citie here unless Maximal city"
  Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Starstomp:
Well, now that the party is over, maybe I should introduce myself more 
properly: I'm Starstomp, miner at the SledgeHammer asteroid mine. I just 
arrived here by some unknown process... and I got into this battle as soon 
as I came out of CR... By the way, I think Nightlight told me this was 
Earth, but isn't earth one of the great commercial center? Where are all the 
cities?


>From: airly2000@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: after the storm

>
>WINDLORD:
>
>"I'm fine "answered Windlord with a smile
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Satrstomp:
> > Yeah, I got hit by some shots, but its nothing internal repairs
>wont fix...
> > How 'bout you?
> >
> >
> > >From: airly2000@y...
> > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >To: nbwrpg@y...
> > >Subject: Re: after the storm
> > >Date: Wed, 25 Jul 2001 18:42:16 -0000
> > >
> > >Windlord:
> > >
> > >"Are you ok? Starstomp" asked Windlord.
> > >
> > >
> > >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...>
>wrote:
> > > > Starstomp came over to where Windlord was talking with the
> > >Maximals. She did
> > > > think they were a bit too chevalresque for her, but they were
>good
> > >fighters
> > > > and they had won her respect! She put her cloak over her
>shoulder
> > >(for those
> > > > wondering, she is a female version of Gundam Sandrock) and said:
> > > > Thanks, you guys! Without your help, we couldn't have held that
> > >long! And
> > > > with all the treachery there's been today, I think we all got
>out
> > >pretty
> > > > good from battle... except Sarge...
> > > >
